short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hedgehog Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Hedgehog background. Cute Hedgehog wallpaper background theme for animal fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Hedgehog wallpapers every time you open a new tab.
2. Choose a random Hedgehog background or set a favorite from the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Quick links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Displays the current date and time.
6. Note feature to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Streamlined access to frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add websites for rapid access.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. One-click sharing options for social media.
13. Instant download options for wallpapers.
14. Quick launch to games.
15. Activate engaging animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new Hedgehog tab.
